images.name: ECMAG.1813, Technics record deck
images.description: The original spray-painted pink Technics record deck used by trip-hop pioneers Massive Attack during the 1980s when they were still part of The Wild Bunch sound system, based in St Paul's.

name: The Technics record deck and The Wild Bunch
description: The original spray-painted pink Technics record deck used by trip-hop pioneers Massive Attack during the 1980s when they were still part of The Wild Bunch sound system, based in St Paul's.

objects.description: Pink 'Technics' quarter deck and turntable, with black slip mat.
